price: 22. Sinni buqree kee sinni caxammixuh waqlal kuula каа yargaqu waah orbisa тага tekkeenik ittak iyyen.
arabic: أَنِ ٱغۡدُواْ عَلَىٰ حَرۡثِكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰرِمِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: ani igh'dū ʿalā ḥarthikum in kuntum ṣārimīna
